Articles.Content:
Hi Guys.

Just saying hi..

I have been playing KSP for about 3 weeks or so now..

So far I have

landed on minmus..

and have a space station core in orbit..

Manages to orbit the sun(few times)

and got on the same orbit line as eve( I could only do this once.. )

Looking FW to learn more about KSP.. and see you projects..

cheers

well hello, if you want help playing this is the right place. Also some of us here do livestreams and that is a great way to learn. If you go to http://www.twitch.tv/leax256 I will be streaming to saturday if you want to watch. I'll give tips for not only how to build rockets but also on how not to build rockets mainly from stuff exploding.

Awesome!! I will def try to tune in saterday
Welcome newcomer! I hope you enjoy this as much as I do! Have fun on the forums!
Welcome to the forums and KSP! Good luck on all your missions!

Welcome to the community kenny'sghost

How about you help pad the forums a bit and make a thread showing your accomplishments so far?

Welcome to the forums! and only 3 weeks and your already on Minmus? how did you do it?

2 reasons

1. I have a friend that's been playing for a some time.. he helped me out..

2. Scott Manley.. his vid's are some of the best out there!!

I must say I crashed a few times into mum and minmus before I could get a landing down..
